Dialogue.Text1: Time to infect some stuff! Let's take a look around.
Dialogue.Text2: (Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move)

Dialogue.Text1: Look at that nasty little guy.
Dialogue.Text2: Let's "persuade" him to join us heheh.

Dialogue.Text1: Check out that organ! Wonder what's inside...

Dialogue.Text2: If I want to move on, I'll have to infect him.
